long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A patent-pending solution for Affiliate Marketers to find the right contact for partnerships.  If you are interested in using our service, head to PubRecruiter.com to find out more.  

Our extension helps you with the following:

- Find Affiliate marketing based contact information when you land on specific websites
- Ability to send partnership inquiries as a brand or as a publisher/influencer! Streamline recruitment with this ultra-fast way to reach out and grow partnerships
- Land on a website without contact info?  Click the flag icon to let us know you want more info!

*Update Notes 8.15.22*

- Notifications!  With every account, you may now receive notifications when a Brand or Affiliate wants to partner up with you.

- Flag to find new partnership information

- Save potential partners when you visit their website

- Information Box changed to accommodate more information

- Find New Opportunities as a Brand or Affiliate
